1010110010000010 1001011010111010 1 -> sum: 0100001100111101, cout: 1

0011011110100000 0010000100000000 0 -> sum: 0101100010100000, cout: 0

1010111101000100 1001011110001010 0 -> sum: 0100011011001110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
